Html:
Hi again,

I assume you will be adding in an eternal belt buckle in the enchant area for waist?

Figured I'd post my latest error as well.  Sometimes when I reload my toon and upgrades again from the armory  I can get it to finish without error.  But not usually.

************** Exception Text **************
System.ArgumentException: An item with the same key has already been added.
   at System.ThrowHelper.ThrowArgumentException(ExceptionResource resource)
   at System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2.Insert(TKey key, TValue value, Boolean add)
   at Rawr.Moonkin.SpellRotation.DPS(Single arcaneDamage, Single natureDamage, Single spellHit, Single spellCrit, Single manaPool, Single fightLength, Single T54pcBonus)
   at Rawr.Moonkin.MoonkinSolver.Solve(Character character, CharacterCalculationsMoonkin& calcs)
   at Rawr.Moonkin.CalculationsMoonkin.GetCharacterCalculations(Character character, Item additionalItem)
   at Rawr.CalculationsBase.GetCharacterCalculations(Character character)
   at Rawr.Optimizer.OptimizeGA(Character injectCharacter, Single injectValue, Single& best, CharacterCalculationsBase& bestCalculations, Boolean& injected)
   at Rawr.Optimizer.Optimize(Character injectCharacter, Single injectValue, Single& best, CharacterCalculationsBase& bestCalculations, Boolean& injected)
   at Rawr.Optimizer.Optimize(Single& bestValue)
   at Rawr.Optimizer.PrivateOptimizeCharacter(Character character, String calculationToOptimize, OptimizationRequirement[] requirements, Int32 thoroughness, Boolean injectCharacter, Boolean& injected, Exception& error)
Rawr already supports adding sockets to belts.  Eternal Belt Buckle is not an enchant, at least not to Rawr.

Well, you can manually add sockets to an item, but we don't really want users to have to edit items in normal use.

Rawr 2.2 will include extra slots for the gems for gloves/bracers/belt.
